items.text: onto his toes as he works this off his hip to square leg
looked to pull, then sways out of it in the end, bunted behind for a single. Well-disguised slower bouncer
bunts this length ball into the offside
items.shortText: Little to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: whips this down to deep square leg
slips this length ball down leg, some exercise for the umpire. Falls away as he looks to bang it in from wide of the crease
eased wide of point for an easy single
floated full on off, defended from the crease
dug in short, this is well above the batsman's head, wide called.
squared up but manages to hold his shape in defence
wrists this length delivery to midwicket
slower and fuller outside off, squeezed down to third man
pulled in front of square to Dockrell at deep midwicket
punches this straight to point
items.shortText: Little to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: plays the short-arm jab down to deep square
short down leg and he helps this along to the fine leg boundary. Easy pickings.
bails out of this stroke as he looks to pull, wide called
width and he crashes this to the point boundary. Tracer bullet stuff. Buffet ball, Mosaddek was waiting for this
items.shortText: Little to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

items.text: works this down to deep midwicket
genuine edge, healthy edge but there's no slip. Races to the third man boundary
pulled down to deep midwicket
scorching drive to sweeper cover
driven firmly to deep cover again, lovely shape, lovely timing.
slower ball outside off, bunts this to third man
pulled all along the ground to deep square
bails out of this short ball
